entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
